title: A Multi-Task Oriented Semantic Communication Framework for Autonomous Vehicles
abstract: arXiv:2403.12997v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: Task-oriented semantic communication is an emerging technology that transmits only the relevant semantics of a message instead of the whole message to achieve a specific task. It reduces latency, compresses the data, and is more robust in low SNR scenarios. This work presents a multi-task-oriented semantic communication framework for connected and autonomous vehicles (CAVs). We propose a convolutional autoencoder (CAE) that performs the semantic encoding of the road traffic signs. These encoded images are then transmitted from one CAV to another CAV through satellite in challenging weather conditions where visibility is impaired. In addition, we propose task-oriented semantic decoders for image reconstruction and classification tasks. Simulation results show that the proposed framework outperforms the conventional schemes, such as QAM-16, regarding the reconstructed image's similarity and the classification's accuracy. translated_title: 为自动驾驶车辆设计的多任务导向语义通信框架
translated_abstract: 任务导向的语义通信是一种新兴技术，它仅传输消息的相关语义而不是整个消息，以实现特定任务，降低延迟，压缩数据，在低信噪比场景中更加鲁棒。本研究提出了一种针对连接和自动驾驶车辆（CAVs）的多任务导向语义通信框架。我们提出了一个卷积自动编码器（CAE），用于对道路交通标志进行语义编码。然后，在挑战性的天气条件下通过卫星，将这些编码图像从一个CAV传输到另一个CAV。此外，我们提出了用于图像重建和分类任务的任务导向语义解码器。仿真结果表明，所提出的框架在重建图像的相似性和分类精度方面优于常规方案，如QAM-16。
tldr: 本研究提出了面向自动驾驶车辆的多任务导向语义通信框架，通过卷积自动编码器实现了道路交通标志的语义编码，有效提高了在复杂天气条件下的通信效率和准确性。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a multi-task oriented semantic communication framework for autonomous vehicles, utilizing a convolutional autoencoder for semantic encoding of road traffic signs, improving communication efficiency and accuracy in challenging weather conditions.
